approval.1: Upon submission of the application by the company
approval.2: Based on the result of the scoring assessment of the company application
approval.3: By the decision of the onboarding commission

empty.filter: The search has not given any results
empty.items: Your company has not published any vendor pools. You can create and publish a vendor pool in the vendor pool management section.

default.title: You do not have access to this part of the vendor pool.
default.text: Contact your vendor pool administrator to obtain rights in the vendor pool.
default.link: To the list of vendor pools

rights.title: You do not have access to this part of the vendor pool.
rights.text: Contact your vendor pool administrator to obtain rights in the vendor pool "{{ value }}".
rights.link: To the list of vendor pools

archive.title: The work with the vendor pool has been stopped.
archive.text:
The vendor pool "{{ value }}" is archived.
Have questions? Contact your Vendor Pool Administrator.
archive.link: To the list of vendor pools

related.title: Before applying to the Vendor List, a vendor should be onboarded to the related Vendors Lists:

process.title: Application for onboarding to the vendor pool
process.empty: You do not need to complete a vendor questionnaire to apply to this vendor pool.

submitted.title: Application for onboarding submitted
submitted.text: The vendor pool owner is reviewing your application. We will let you know the result.

obsolete.title: Application for onboarding in the vendor pool
obsolete.message: The vendor pool owner has changed the questionnaire. Prepare a new application.
obsolete.notice: Previously entered data is transferred to the new application. Check if they are correct.

1.title: Exclude company from vendor pool
1.description: The company will be excluded from the vendor pool and will not be able to initiate re-inclusion

2.title: Invite company to the vendor pool
2.description: The company will be able to reapply for inclusion in the vendor pool

3.title: Suspend onboarding
3.description: The company has temporarily failed to get onboarding to this vendor pool. To update onboarding, a company can reapply

4.title: Update onboarding
4.description: The company's status in the vendor pool will be updated

5.title: Request data update
5.description: The company will receive a letter with a request to update the data specified in the application for onboarding to this vendor pool

block.title: Exclude company from vendor pool
block.text: The company fails to get onboarding (if any) to this vendor pool and cannot initiate re-inclusion for the onboarding update. The action is reversible, you can invite the company to the vendor pool again.

reason.label: Specify the reason...
reason.hint: The reason will be passed on to the employees of the excluded company

unblock.title: Invite company to the vendor pool
unblock.text: The company will be able to reapply for inclusion to the  vendor pool.

suspend.title: Suspend onboarding
suspend.text: The company fails to get onboarding to this vendor pool, but can independently initiate a re-application. The action is reversible, you can upddate onboarding of the company in the future.

reason.label: Specify the reason...
reason.hint: The reason will be shown to employees of the company

unsuspend.title: Update onboarding
unsuspend.text: The company's status to the vendor pool will be updated

renew.title: Request data update
renew.text: The company will receive a letter with a request to update the data specified in the application for onboarding to this vendor pool.

reason.label: Specify the reason...
reason.hint: The reason will be shown to employees of the company

renew.success: Data update request has been sent

invite_by_link.title: Invite by link
invite_by_link.descr: Invitation link for onboarding in the vendor pool

invite_from_site.title: Invite from the platform
invite_from_site.descr: Companies will apply for onboarding in the vendor pool

accredit_from_site.title: Onboard from the platform
accredit_from_site.descr: Companies will be onboarded in the vendor pool without filling out the questionnaire

invite_by_link.title: Invite by link
invite_by_link.text: Copy and send the link to the representative of the company you want to invite for onboarding to the vendor pool.
invite_by_link.hint: Press Ctrl + C to copy to clipboard

no-rights.text:
You are not eligible to apply for onboarding.

Contact your company administrator for the right to complete the action.

anonymous.message: Find your company or register your business on Bidzaar
anonymous.notice:
Register yor company for free on
Bidzaar to be onboarded to the vendor pool
